info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: The Silent Orchestra
collection.openText: From break and ruin, the most beautiful performance begins.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was Good, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.

The music that is played by $0 when it escapes consists of 4 Movements. As the piece progresses, the employees listening will suffer WHITE damage, meanwhile the size of the audible area of the music expands.

For each Movement, the weakness of $0 changed. The 1st Movement was Pale, while the 2nd Movement was Black. For the 3rd Movement it was White, and lastly, during the 4th Movement, only Red type attacks were effective. When the music reached the climax, $0 became immune to all forms of attack.

etc.param: 1st Movement, Adagio e Tranquillo: Calm and slow
3rd Movement, Accelerando e Crescendo: Gradually faster, growing
4th Movement, Stringendo: Pressing ever forward, clutching
Finale con fuoco, ma non troppo: Passionately like fire, yet refined.
